page.title: 20THE SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: When Dawn , David, my mum and me go down to the precinct to shop at the Co-op there is always a lot of litter around the shop. When I go to the Queen's Medical Centre there is not a lot of litter because it is so tidy. One day in the precinct I saw a man throw a chip wrapper on the ground, I went over and picked it up and put it in a litter bin. Another man told me that I was a good girl. I wish Cotgrave was a lot neater and people didn't throw litter around. Mr. Hurt, our Headmaster, told us that only fools want to make their village look untidy.
